components: SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING
summary: DT*: THE CONTACT STATED WHILE DEPRESSING THE BRAKE PEDAL AT 35 MPH THE VEHICLE HITCHED AND BUCKED.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A SERVICE DEALER WHERE THEY DETERMINED THE VEHICLE WAS LACKING OIL.  THERE WAS ALSO SIGNIFICANT DAMAGE TO THE BRAKE SHOES.  THE BRAKE SHOES WERE REPLACED AND THE OIL WAS REFILLED.  THE OIL QUICKLY DEPLETED AFTER BEING REFILLED.  UPDATED 7/13/2006 - *NM
